section.title: Exercise: Manual export
section.para: The following exercise is a repetition. Very early in this $books you have exported your application already.
Use your product configuration file to manually export your Eclipse RCP application.
Start your exported Eclipse application directory. If you face issues with starting the application check the possible problem list in the Product Export chapter of this book.

section.title: Exercise: Validate the Tycho tutorial
section.para: Install Maven. Create a new workspace and follow the two tutorial for building plug-ins and products with Maven Tycho.
Following these tutorials reduces the complexity of the automatic setup as they are based on a minimal number of Eclipse components.

section.title: Exercise: Tycho Build for the Todo application
section.para: Once you have successfully finished a minimal build setup, create pom.xml files for your Todo components.
After the setup ensure that you can automatically build your Eclipse application with Maven Tycho and that you can start the resulting export.
